name: Lost in my Flames[Jam Edition]
description:
I definitely learned something from this experience...is not easy to make a game,especially in 5 days.You have this big idea you try to make smaller and more smaller just so you meet the deadline,tons of features not meating the final product.

It was definitely a very cool..and stressful experience,motivated me to work harder than before to publish a game be it bad or good,doesn't matter,a published game is better than a game that's not published!

This game may or not become something bigger(a proper game) depending on how it's going to be received(it's short i don't expect much) and my own feelings for it.

Thanks for playing or for at least taking a look at the game.And that's all i had to say.
